subject: Unit testing when startup and teardown is expensive.

messageBody:
I am unit testing Agents with Jade (http://jade.cselt.it/). Starting
and shutting the platform and is very expensive. It's on the order of
a minute or two to start the platform. Before I run my unit tests, I
want to start the platform and when they are all done, I want to shut
it down. This is easy to do if I only have one test method in my test
case. I can just put the startup code in the setup method and the
shutdown code in the tear down. Unfortnately, if I have more than one
method in the test case this happens before and after each method. If
I have 10 test methods, the unit test could take 20 minutes instead of
just 3 minutes. Is there a way to start the platform, run all of the
tests in the TestCase, and then shut down the platform? Thanks.



Jay
